title: FS: Lot of 68 T210 Old Mill - All Series w/ Many Tough Cards *PRICE DROP 7/10*
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 68 T210 Old Mill - All Series w/ Many Tough Cards *PRICE DROP 7/10*
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T210 Old Mill cards for sale. This is a nice group, with an assortment of low/mid/higher grade cards from all 8 Series.  Many very difficult and rarely offered cards in this lot!

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:

Cool. I had no idea the story of the Trolley Punch cards. I have 30ish Greenville cards from this set but never heard of these variations!

[quote name="TAFKADixie" post=2524444]Cool. I had no idea the story of the Trolley Punch cards. I have 30ish Greenville cards from this set but never heard of these variations![/QUOTE]

I was not familiar with them either until I picked up one from the original collection a few years ago.  Since then, I have found a few others in different lots or sold individually.  Here's the website for the original collection with some more info on these.  Definitely an interesting little subset!

[url]https://www.martimar-cards.com/about-1[/url]
